title: AssertionError: torch-cuda80==0.1.6.post17 .dist-info directory not found
body_html:
An error occured when using
pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torchvision-0.1.6-py3-none-any.whl
to install pytorch, what should i do to fix it?
body_text:
An error occured when using
pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl  pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torchvision-0.1.6-py3-none-any.whl
to install pytorch, what should i do to fix it?
body:
An error occured when using 
`pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torch_cuda80-0.1.6.post17-cp35-cp35m-linux_x86_64.whl 
pip install https://s3.amazonaws.com/pytorch/whl/torchvision-0.1.6-py3-none-any.whl`
to install pytorch, what should i do to fix it?
